results.output:
# The Shorn Sovereign

Silent sovereign, stoically surrendering strands,
Scissors snipping, severing splendid spectacle—standing,
Shadowed sorrows secretly seeping, soul-scars showing,
Silver streamers softly spiraling, symbolically slowing,
Solemn sacrifice sustains sacred strength, still shining,
Survival's song, steadfast sovereign, sublimely signing.
